name: CoeHarMod_2 Update Log 更新日志

civilopediaText.text: Fine-tuned the effects of some buildings and policies.微调部分建筑和政策效果。
1.Changed Chariot Archers (ranged) to Heavy Chariots (melee).战车射手（远程）改为重型战车（近战）。
2.Anti-cavalry units against regular melee units (Warriors) -50% combat effectiveness.抗骑兵单位对战普通近战单位（勇士Warrior）-50%战斗力。
3.Removed unit supply mechanism.取消单位补给机制。
Fixed the error where population did not limit the number of specialization directions.修复人口没能限制专精方向数量的错误。
2.Enhanced military buildings/entertainment buildings/farms/mines.强化军事建筑/娱乐建筑/农田/矿井
